meanings.definition: The quality of being unlike anything else.
meanings.sent1: Her painting stood out because of its uniqueness.
meanings.sent2: The uniqueness of her voice made her a memorable singer.
meanings.sent3: The uniqueness of the situation made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His uniqueness in style was compared to a rare gem.
meanings.sent5: The uniqueness of the flower's color was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being unique.
meanings.sent1: The company prided itself on the uniqueness of its products.
meanings.sent2: The uniqueness of her personality made her easy to recognize.
meanings.sent3: The uniqueness of the cake's design made it a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: The uniqueness of his perspective was like a fresh breeze.
meanings.sent5: The uniqueness of the snowflake's shape fascinated the children.
